## Quick Services

[#### BUY DATA

Buy from our variety of unmatched plans to enjoy the superfast speed that gives you the unfair advantage

![Previous](https://www.gloworld.com/themes/glo/assets/imgs/icons/arrow-right.svg)](https://www.gloworld.com/gh/personal/data/data-plans "Buy Data")

[#### Tariff Plans

Choose from our diverse range of voice/SMS plans that suits your budget, style and other preferences

![Previous](https://www.gloworld.com/themes/glo/assets/imgs/icons/arrow-right.svg)](https://www.gloworld.com/gh/personal/voice/plans)

[#### Borrow Data

For when you run out of data and can't buy immediately, use "Borrow Me Data" to borrow now & pay later.

![Previous](https://www.gloworld.com/themes/glo/assets/imgs/icons/arrow-right.svg)](# "Borrow Data")

[#### SHARE DATA

You can now share your data plans online with friends and family.

![Previous](https://www.gloworld.com/themes/glo/assets/imgs/icons/arrow-right.svg)](https://www.gloworld.com/gh/data-sharing "Data Sharing")

[#### GIFT DATA

Send Glo data from your current balance to anyone on the Glo network instantly at no cost

![Previous](https://www.gloworld.com/themes/glo/assets/imgs/icons/arrow-right.svg)](https://www.gloworld.com/gh/data-gifting "Data Gifting")

[#### PAY AS YOU GO

See our IDD (International Direct Dialing) PAYGO rate to different countries.

![Previous](https://www.gloworld.com/themes/glo/assets/imgs/icons/arrow-right.svg)](https://www.gloworld.com/gh/personal/voice/idd/pay-as-you-go)

[#### GLO BUSINESS

Enterprise grade solutions and services for corporate organisations, SMEs and public sectors.

![Previous](https://www.gloworld.com/themes/glo/assets/imgs/icons/arrow-right.svg)](# "Glo Business")

[#### BUY DATA

## Find A Store

Input your location and see the Glo agent service point nearest to you.

## GLO CAFE - Where it all Goes Down

Glo Cafe app is a one-stop destination for managing your Globacom account, bill payments, mobile recharges and entertainment. The Glo Cafe App gives you the power to manage all your connections and services through one application.

![App Store](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7) ![Play Store](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)
